text:
If run under Eclipse, the ant Anakia task is unable to find the stylesheets 
in ./xdocs/stylesheets.

This is because Anakia starts looking for relative files from the JVM launch 
directory, which is generally not the same as the directory containg build.xml.

The patch (to follow) defines the property eclipse.anakia.
This property is then used to prefix the style="" relative paths. 
Since the default value is empty, this does not affect ordinary builds.
The Eclipse External Tools properties page can then be used to assign the 
appopriate value to the property (e.g. eclipse.anakia=workspace/jmeter/).

[It would have been nice to automatically calculate this value in the build 
file itself, but I've not found how to do this.]

Patch follows.
